scripts.build: rm -rf public && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:hugo
scripts.build:css: node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true --include-path node_modules/bourbon-neat/core themes/pause/src/styles/styles.scss themes/pause/static/css/styles.css
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js & npm run watch:hugo
scripts.watch:css: node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true --include-path node_modules/bourbon-neat/core themes/pause/src/styles/styles.scss themes/pause/static/css/styles.css --watch
